column4: I have configured apache2 to use virtual hosts for domain1.com and domain2.com but it will not show the page i put in the home dir for each site.. what is the problem.. 1 IP fir 2 domains
yes, i think its a problem with 'namevirtualhost' - what should i put the hostname or the ip in each hostfile?
you want to pastebin your httpd.conf and sites-enabled files?
